Name: Auditory Gamma Entrainment
EthicsApprovals: This study was approved by the Review Board of Tehran University of Medical Sciences (Approval ID: IR.TUMS.MEDICINE.REC.1398.524) and all participants provided informed consent before participating and were free to withdraw at any time.
Acknowledgements: The author wish to thank Ziaeian Hospital in Tehran for providing staff time and equipment for data collection in this study. I am grateful to the patients and their families who participated in this study.
